com.flipkart.lois.channel.api
Interface SendChannel<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Subinterfaces:
Channel<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferedChannel, BufferedPassByRefChannel, SimpleChannel, SimplePassByRefChannel
public interface SendChannel<T>

A simple "go" like channel abstraction for java over which messages can only be sent

Method Summary
 void close()
          Close channel so that no new messages can be sent over this channel.
 boolean isOpen()
          Returns true if channel is open and false if channel is closed.
 boolean isSendable()
          Returns true if a message can be sent on the channel
 void send(T message)
          Send a message of Type T if the channel hasn't been closed and is available to send a message.
 void send(T message, long timeOut, TimeUnit timeUnit)
          Send a message of Type T if the channel hasn't been closed and is available to send a message.
 boolean trySend(T message)
          A non blocking send of Type T if the channel hasn't been closed and is available to send a message.
 

Method Detail

send

void send(T message)
          throws ChannelClosedException,
                 InterruptedException
Send a message of Type T if the channel hasn't been closed and is available to send a message. If the channel is not free put the calling thread in a wait state until it becomes available to send a message. If the channel has been closed then a ChannelClosedException is thrown.

Parameters:
message -
Throws:
ChannelClosedException
InterruptedException

send

void send(T message,
          long timeOut,
          TimeUnit timeUnit)
          throws ChannelClosedException,
                 TimeoutException,
                 InterruptedException
Send a message of Type T if the channel hasn't been closed and is available to send a message. If the channel is not free put the calling thread in a wait state until it becomes available to send a message until timeOut TimeUnit's have passed, at which point throw a TimeoutException. If the channel has been closed then a ChannelClosedException is thrown.

Parameters:
message -
timeOut -
timeUnit -
Throws:
ChannelClosedException
TimeoutException
InterruptedException

trySend

boolean trySend(T message)
                throws ChannelClosedException
A non blocking send of Type T if the channel hasn't been closed and is available to send a message. If the channel is not free return false, if the channel is available and send was successful return true.

Parameters:
message -
Returns:
true if send was successful, false if send failed at this instance.
Throws:
ChannelClosedException

close

void close()
Close channel so that no new messages can be sent over this channel. The messages that are already available on the channel can be consumed.

isOpen

boolean isOpen()
Returns true if channel is open and false if channel is closed.

Returns:
true if channel is open, false if channel is closed

isSendable

boolean isSendable()
                   throws ChannelClosedException
Returns true if a message can be sent on the channel

Returns:
true if a message can be sent on the channel
Throws:
ChannelClosedException
